DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, observational, case series investigating the feasibility of utilizing OCT scans of the anterior chamber of eyes with uveitis.
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Anterior Chamber Inflammation by Optical Coherence Tomography
DOC.criteria: All patients presenting to Cole Eye Institute with uveitis. Inability to provide informed consent, including nonEnglish speaking and cognitively/mentally impaired. Severe corneal opacities preventing imaging of anterior chamber
